data.title: Aloysius Cardinal Ambrozic Obituary - Toronto, Ontario
data.meta_description: CARDINAL AMBROZIC, Aloysius -  The Archibishop Emertius of Toronto  Peacefully after a lengthy illness with Progressive Supranuclear Palsy at the Scarborough General Hospital surrounded by the love of his family on Friday August 26, 2011.  Aloysius Cardinal Ambrozic was born in Dobrova, Slovenia, the second of the seven children of Aloysius Ambrozic and his wife Helena Picar. Dear brother of Matthew (Mimi) Ambrozic, John (Helga) Ambrozic, Anthony (Vera) Ambrozic, Jerry (Majda) Ambrozic, Frances (Charles) Cerar and Helena Golob and her husband the late Theodore Golob. Lovingly remembered by his many nieces, nephews, grandnieces, grandnephews, family and friends. Cardinal Ambrozic will rest at St. Michael's Cathedral, 65 Bond  Street for visitation on Tuesday August 30, 2011 from 2pm to 4pm and 7pm to 9pm. Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated Wednesday August 31, 2011 at St. Michael's Cathedral at 10:30am.  Entombment in the Bishops Mausoleum at Holy Cross Cemetery.  In lieu of flowers donations to  The Shepherds' Trust would be greatly appreciated by the family. 'The family wishes to thank the staff of the Houses of Providence, and especially his Personal Support Workers for their compassionate care'. Funeral arrangements entrusted to the NEWEDIUK FUNERAL HOME, KIPLING CHAPEL, 2058 Kipling Avenue (416-745-7555)
